trans-unit.source: Specifies drill-down and node viewing mode for an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, such as Flowcharts, that are used to compose activities.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o detalhamento e o nó de modo de visualização para um <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, como fluxogramas, que são usados para compor atividades.</xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Drilling down into the UI elements is allowed by default.
trans-unit.target: Drill-down até os elementos de interface do usuário é permitido por padrão.

trans-unit.source: It can be disallowed by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser permitido, definindo o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child nodes are not always collapsed by default, but can be set to always collapse by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nós filho não são recolhidos por padrão, mas pode ser definidos para sempre recolher definindo o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute*> class.

The default values assigned by this constructor are `true` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property and `false` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os valores padrão atribuídos por este construtor são `true` para o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>propriedade e `false` para o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drilling down one level into an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se aprofundar em um nível em uma <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>é permitido.</xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drilling into the UI elements is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o detalhamento para os elementos de interface do usuário é permitido. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the child nodes are always collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os nós filho são recolhidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the child nodes are always collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os nós filho são recolhidos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the function of outline view icon provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a função do provedor de ícone de exibição de estrutura de tópicos.

trans-unit.source: The function of outline view icon provider.
trans-unit.target: A função do provedor de ícone de exibição de estrutura de tópicos.
